ygData.subject: Re: Re: Eldritch Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Uhm, if I kill DE necros do I loose faction with Dark Elf Guards ? and the city of Neriak ? and is the 27c blackbox quest hard ? can I say do like 30 of
ygData.messageBody:
>You can quest for the gemchoppers, the 27c blackbox quest gives eldritch
>faction when you give the keycards to the clockworks, ya need good faction
>with King Ak'anon though (the clockwork faction)
>
>Or you can kill members of The Dead (DE necros) such as Kizdean Gix in the
>west commons.


Uhm, if I kill DE necros do I loose faction with Dark Elf Guards ? and the
city of Neriak
?

and is the 27c blackbox quest hard ? can I say do like 30 of them in 1 hour?

Cuz I dont want to waste 30 hours fixing my faction and I also dont want to
kill my DE faction.
